title: Change reference accessing a property of the reference not in the view
description:
Hi all, I would like to use an action on a reference that changes a property of another reference (that property is not in the view). I have seen in the HowTo that there is a workaround by using the class MapFacade, but I cannot figure out how to use it. The documentation is not complete and there are no examples. If there is a solution then please share.

Thanx
